selected_quotes: Prevalence of post-partum depression is higher in urban than rural mothers in #Canada
Postpartum #depression more common in urban moms than rural ones. Social drift or not, this is important.
Does where you live influence your risk for postpartum depression?
We found this 4 #postpartum #depression: Partly expl. by poor social support in urban areas

citation.abstract: The relation between place of residence and risk of postpartum depression is uncertain. We evaluated the relation between place of residence and risk of postpartum depression in a population-based sample of Canadian women.
citation.title: Relation between place of residence and postpartum depression
